documents.document: Terrible Experience This Hotel should be cataloged under 1 star Hotels category. PAID VERY HIGH TARIFF ALMOST S$200,UNBELIAVBLE.We staied 1 night and it was a terrible experience,hotel very old and dirty with a strong moldy smell that made Us couldnt sleep.In the morning a very strong noise come from outside,they were doing some renovation and it wsnt told Us from anybody.Francesco
